data.field: Returns the value of EXPR with filename expansions such as the standard Unix shell /bin/sh would do. This is the internal function implementing the <*.c> operator, but you can use it directly. If EXPR is omitted, $_ is used. The <*.c> operator is discussed in more detail in [%linkNodeTitle "perlman:perlop|I/O Operators", $NODE, "I/O Operators",{anchor=>"I_O_Operators"};%].
